LanguageData.AteWithoutTable.stages.ate_without_table: I had to eat a meal off the ground. Can't we get a table around here?
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.I_butche: I butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.catharsis.label: catharsis
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.catharsis.description: It felt good to finally unbottle my feelings.
LanguageData.ColonistBanished.stages.colonist_banishe: We just banished someone. I hope they make it, but I'm worried.
LanguageData.ColonistBanishedToDie.stages.colonist_ba: We banished someone in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
LanguageData.ColonyPrisonerEscaped.stages.Colonist_pr: Can't we keep control of our own people? I feel like anything could happen to me here.
LanguageData.DefeatedHostileFactionLeader.stages.defe: They were leading efforts to destroy us, and I took them down!
LanguageData.DefeatedMechCluster.stages.defeated_mech: Blood beats metal, you damn machines!
LanguageData.DeniedJoining.stages.denied_joining.desc: We just denied someone's request to join us. I hope they make it.
LanguageData.FailedToRescueRelative.stages.failed_to_: We had a chance to rescue my relative, and failed. I could have helped!
LanguageData.FreedFromSlavery.stages.freed_from_slave: I have been freed from slavery. I'm so thankful!
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Bloodlust.stages.bloodlus: Extracting the flesh from their bodies is so bloody and satisfying.
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeBloodlust.stages.killed_s: I killed someone! What a rush!
LanguageData.KnowBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.buried_in: This colony buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. May their soul rest in peace.
LanguageData.KnowButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.we_b: We butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.KnowColonistOrganHarvested.stages.coloni: Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.someones_: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.stages.prisoner_sold.de: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested.stages.my_organ_harvest: The colony harvested body parts from me! They're breaking me down like an old engine!
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.initial_hope.label: initial hope
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.initial_hope.descri: I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.stages.initial_optimis: It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new settlement.
LanguageData.Nuzzled.stages.nuzzled.label: nuzzled
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.stages.observed_cor: I saw a dead body laying on the ground. It was disturbing.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingRottingCorpse.stages.obser: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. It was disgusting.
LanguageData.OnDuty.stages.on_duty.label: on duty
LanguageData.OnDuty.stages.on_duty.description: I have a job to do.
LanguageData.PrisonerBanishedToDie.stages.prisoner_ba: We banished a prisoner in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
LanguageData.ReleasedHealthyPrisoner.stages.prisoner_: We released a healthy prisoner. It feels good to know we even treat prisoners well.
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.rescued.label: rescued
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.rescued.description: I was rescued! I almost thought I was done for back there. I'm so thankful.
LanguageData.RescuedRelative.stages.rescued.label: rescued {0}
LanguageData.RescuedRelative.stages.rescued.descripti: We rescued one of my relatives. Finally, I can breathe a sigh of relief.
LanguageData.SleepDisturbed.stages.disturbed_sleep.de: I was disturbed during sleep by people moving around nearby. A private room would solve this.
LanguageData.SleptInCold.stages.slept_in_the_cold.des: I had to sleep in the cold. We really need some heaters.
LanguageData.SleptInHeat.stages.slept_in_the_heat.des: I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have air conditioning?
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.stages.slept_on_ground.des: I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.slept_outside.label: slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.slept_outside.descri: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.
LanguageData.SoakingWet.stages.soaking_wet.label: soaking wet
LanguageData.TravelAnticipation.stages.eager_to_trave: I've been preparing this caravan for a while. I'm looking forward to the upcoming journey.
LanguageData.TravelAnticipation.stages.excited_to_tra: So much thought and preparation have gone into this adventure. I can't wait to set off!
LanguageData.WasImprisoned.stages.was_imprisoned.desc: The colony had me in jail for a while, like a caged animal.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly.stages.witnessed_ally: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathBloodlust.stages.witnessed: I saw someone die! That was intense!
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathFamily.stages.witnessed_fa: I saw a member of my family die. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathNonAlly.stages.witnessed_o: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
